column1: #Text=Official code for ACL 2024 paper: [VerifiNER: Verification-augmented NER via Knowledge-grounded Reasoning with Large Language Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2402.18374).
#Text=This is the overview of VerifiNER framework.
#Text=Using entity prediction by existing models, we (a) extract candidate spans to retrieve knowledge from KB and verify factuality of span accordingly.
#Text=Then (b) using retrieved knowledge, we verify factuality of type by generating knowledge-grounded evidence.
#Text=We take consistency voting to select a candidate that is the most contextually relevant, with the help of the reasoning ability of LLMs.
#Text=Please refer to the paper for details.
#Text=This shell script allows you to run preprocessing, verification, and evaluation all at once.
#Text=If you find our work useful, please cite our paper:
#Text=      title={VerifiNER: Verification-augmented NER via Knowledge-grounded Reasoning with Large Language Models},
#Text=      author={Seoyeon Kim and Kwangwook Seo and Hyungjoo Chae and Jinyoung Yeo and Dongha Lee},
